mapper.update: UPDATE board_config SET board_en_name = #{boardEnName}, board_kr_name = #{boardKrName}, use_file = #{useFile}, use_comment = #{useComment}, category_id = #{categoryId}, board_desc = #{boardDesc}, sub_name_01 = #{subName01}, sub_name_02 = #{subName02}, sub_name_03 = #{subName03}, sub_name_04 = #{subName04}, sub_name_05 = #{subName05}, sub_name_06 = #{subName06}, sub_name_07 = #{subName07} where board_en_name = #{boardEnName}
mapper.insert: insert into board_category(category_en_name, category_kr_name, board_en_name) values (#{categoryEnName}, #{categoryKrName}, #{boardEnName})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_content SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category_code_id = #{categoryCodeId}, reg_date = #{regDate}, is_notice = #{isNotice}, sub01 = #{sub01}, sub02 = #{sub02}, sub03 = #{sub03}, sub04 = #{sub04}, sub05 = #{sub05}, sub06 = #{sub06}, sub07 = #{sub07} where content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.category_code_name,u.user_name from board_content b left join board_category_code c on c.category_code_id = b.category_code_id left join users AS u ON b.writer_id = u.user_id where content_id = #{contentId}

select * from board_category_code left join board_category on board_category_code.category_id = board_category.category_id
AND board_category_code.category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply(content_id, parent_id, parent_reply_id, reply_content, reply_writer) values (#{contentId}, #{parentId}, #{parentReplyId}, #{replyContent}, #{replyWriter})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, u.user_name, (select user_name from board_reply as r left join users on users.user_id = r.reply_writer where reply_id = a.parent_reply_id) as to_name FROM board_reply as a LEFT JOIN users as u on u.user_id = a.reply_writer WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(parent_id), reply_id, parent_id), parent_reply_id
